EmailTemplate.subject: Your Imc CAM Connection - January Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 2012 Edition (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Jan12_Main.html) Happy New Year and welcome to the January issue of Imc Solutions' CAM Connection newsletter. The main page gives you an overall glance at what this month's newsletter has to offer. We hope you enjoy it.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Jan12_AlertUpdates.html)
> Build 19 - New Year, New Release!
> Submit Your Product Enhancement Requests Online
Products & Services (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Jan12_ProductsServices.html)
> Steve Damren, Sr. Systems Specialist at Somerset County in Maine [DEMO]
> Best Practices for Building Comprehensive Records [DEMO]
> Fix it with Felicia [WEBINAR]
Technical Support Hot Topics (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Jan12_TechnicalSupportHotTopics.html)
> Technical Q&As
> Windows 7 System Configuration ﻿
